statements: UPDATE player_progress SET points = 100, game_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_progress SET player_name = 'Alice', last_played_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_progress SET points = 1000, game_level = 5, last_played_date = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_progress SET last_played_date = '2022-08-17 15:45:00', game_level = 6, points = 1500 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_profile SET game_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 5, is_equipped = true WHERE item_id = 101 AND player_id = 1
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 10, is_equipped = true WHERE player_id = 101 AND item_id = 202
UPDATE player_profile SET game_level = 5, coins = 2000 WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE player_progress SET game_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 5, item_id = 100 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_progress SET game_level = 10, experience_points = 500 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_lost = 5, games_won = 10 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_inventory SET item_quantity = 20 WHERE inventory_id = 456;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, game_progress = 50 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_stats SET health = 100, experience = experience + 50 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_name = 'Health Potion';
